io.micronaut.inject.visitor

Interface VisitorContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConvertibleValues<Object>, Iterable<Map.Entry<String,Object>>, MutableConvertibleValues<Object>, ValueResolver<CharSequence>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroovyVisitorContext, JavaVisitorContext

    public interface VisitorContext
extends MutableConvertibleValues<Object>
    Provides a way for TypeElementVisitor classes to log messages during compilation and fail compilation.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh, Graeme Rocher

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.micronaut.core.convert.value.ConvertibleValues
